style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">10月22日下午消息，欢聚时代（YY）联合创始人、董事长兼CEO李学凌在朋友圈晒出身体植入芯片的经历，并表示这样可以“更好地了解自己”。李学凌称，这是里程碑的一天，未来会有更多的人在身体里植入芯片。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22145931/riaq3saie8pnyq9u.png!heading" data-img-size-val="776,592"/><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">@思多睿：我家的狗狗老早就注入检疫注册芯片了啊。</span></p><p>@不养喵ZZ：不参与人体生化反应的芯片还不如叫传感器。</p><p>@不让用啊：怎么过安检。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/141327" target="_blank">FF内部邮件：恒大违约致公司财务困难，全员降薪并寻求新融资</a></h3><p>36氪从FF内部获悉，由于投资方恒大健康未能履行其承诺并支付其同意支付的款项，导致FF正在面临财务困难。美国时间10月21日，FF通过全员邮件表示：公司因此被迫将对全员降薪20%。其中，公司创始人兼CEO贾跃亭将只领取一美金年薪，并已与新融资展开洽谈。接下来，公司将“不得不采取裁员行动。”</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22150149/j3lfnclwk92vigkq.png!heading" data-img-size-val="652,420"/></p><p>@边缘0028：服的不是你的演技，是你的皮能厚过地壳。</p><p>@在倥侗增添：贾跃亭：我差的是这一美元吗？</p><p>@敬一山：用梦想发电~</p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/141201" target="_blank">马蜂窝声明：已被查证有组织攻击，将采取法律手段维护自身权益</a></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">36氪讯，马蜂窝发布声明称，“针对该文中歪曲事实的言论，和已被查证的有组织攻击行为，马蜂窝将采取法律手段维护自身权益。 ”马蜂窝称，自媒体文章所述的马蜂窝用户数量，与事实和第三方机构数据都严重不符；将马蜂窝用户内容生产的活跃周期，与餐饮等本地生活服务类APP相对比，并解读为马蜂窝员工有组织地抄袭，存在明显误导倾向；将不法商家的违规行为归结于马蜂窝，与事实严重不符。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22150209/ppfzh8vvbojn92zn.png!heading" data-img-size-val="780,438"/></p><p>@千与：这下真的捅成马蜂窝了。</p><p>@小白兔：我只看他们的旅游攻略。</p><p>@我心永恒：竟然真的是星期一上班以后再辟谣。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style=""><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/141269" target="_blank">阿里将向太空发射迷你空间站和通讯卫星</a></h3><p>36氪讯，双十一前后，阿里巴巴将启动“一站一星”计划，向太空发射“糖果罐号”迷你空间站和“天猫国际号”通讯卫星。据项目组人士介绍，该计划能更好地实现双十一期间线上、线下互动。阿里还将通过“一站一星”计划，与多家科研单位合作，共同探索相关空间技术及无人驾驶技术的行业落地。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22150226/u5vl11ekp92jnnna.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="690,459"/></p><p>@罗晋波1531：马云要去寻找他的外星人同伴。</p><p>@羲和为牧：是地球留不住你？还是你飘了？</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>今天科技圈发生的热点事件大家有什么想吐槽的吗？欢迎在下方评论区留言，优秀的神回复将会出现在下一次的文章中哦~</p>
title: ​科技神回复 | YY CEO李学凌自曝在身体植入芯片，然而这只是血糖仪

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Schools tell us that Chromebooks fill three big needs: they’re easy for students and teachers to use, they’re easy to share and they’re easy to manage. Today, we have some exciting news about the management of Chromebooks that will make the Chrome Education license—our cloud-based device management console—more accessible to schools across New Zealand.  This follows on the<a href="https://www.blog.google/outreach-initiatives/education/new-zealand-schools-chromebooks-top-list-learning-tools/">announcement</a>last year that Chromebooks are the number one device used in New Zealand schools, and is great news for schools and families using Chromebooks or considering investing in them.</p><br/><p>Starting on November 1, as <a href="https://edu.google.com/intl/en_nz/chrome-edu-licence/">part of an agreement</a> with Google and the New Zealand Ministry of Education, all state and state-integrated schools across New Zealand will be able to start claiming Ministry-funded <a href="http://services.google.com/fh/files/misc/chrome_education_licence_nz.pdf">Chrome Education licenses</a> to manage new and existing unmanaged Chromebooks. The Chrome Education license was developed to make device management in schools a breeze, so that teachers and students can focus on what’s most important—teaching and learning. Equipped with the Chrome Education license, schools can utilize essential education features to better support the many ways Chromebooks are used in the classroom.</p><br/>“This is fantastic news for the Manaiakalani Schools,” says Mrs. Dorothy Burt, Education Program Lead in the Manaiakalani Innovation team, “we have been using Chromebooks since they first became available to New Zealand schools in 2013 and have relied on the devices having the Chrome Education license to ensure the focus remains on learning and teaching.”  <br/><br/>Schools of all sizes can benefit from the Chrome Education license, as Mrs. Burt points out— “the positive impact of the license to schools is experienced in our big schools, with large fleets of Chromebooks to manage, and equally in our very small rural schools where the sole charge teaching principal has more important matters to focus on than the status of learner devices.”</div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="image2" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/image2_ti2uR8h.max-1000x1000.jpg"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Point England School, part of the Manaiakalani community of learning, have been using the Chrome Education License to manage their Chromebook fleet since 2013.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Most importantly, quality teaching and learning is safely brought to the forefront, underpinned by our commitment to providing the best security measurements <a href="https://edu.google.com/k-12-solutions/privacy-security/?modal_active=none">protecting teacher and student privacy</a> “With this in place we have the confidence that our move to having young people learning on personal devices in a digital environment is well managed and safe. Expectations of whānau are easily applied across all devices. Teachers can spend their time where it counts—on children and their learning—rather than managing devices.”</p><br/><p>The Chrome Education license allows schools to update any number of <a href="http://edu.google.co.nz/intl/en_nz/k-12-solutions/chromebooks/?modal_active=none">Chromebooks (</a>once they are enrolled)—without touching a single one. In the simple cloud-based management console, there are over 200 policies that schools can apply to manage their fleet of Chromebooks.  You can learn more about them <a href="http://services.google.com/fh/files/misc/chrome_education_licence_nz.pdf">here</a>, but for now, here are three of them that are sure to be the teacher’s pet!</p><br/><p>Give teachers and students confidence that during class, they’re all the on same webpage!</p>The Education license lets school admins and teachers customize the user experience. This is a handy feature that can automatically load frequently used websites—such as <a href="https://www.blog.google/outreach-initiatives/education/time-refresh-meet-new-google-classroom/">Google Classroom</a>, Khan Academy—on boot-up, as well as adding custom bookmarks, pinning apps and extensions, and blocking distractions.</div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="image1" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/image1_K31MbXp.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Lead students right to most used apps and extensions, such as WeVideo, Khan Academy, Pixlr, and the Google Classroom extension</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><b>The multi-tasker for school and family use</b><br/>The “<a href="https://support.google.com/a/answer/1375678?hl=en?utm_source=marketo&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=FY18-Q3-18q3-gc-edu-runrate-chrome-email-newsletter-cmpgn-issuexii&amp;utm_content=newsletter&amp;mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWW1KaE56WTJPRGs1TW1NMyIsInQiOiJIQzZsK3N0RVAwc0ZFME5Jb3haOVBmYjZlK1ZBNDVQbWdhdkFURWw2Y3oxSlNWU1VLcUFwbXJyTzF6MDJrdVZzTTZDQ01iWTVOWDlxVkJFM3dFUmdXUT09In0%3D">off-hours device policy</a>” feature is particularly helpful for Chromebooks that are used at school and as the family device. For example, school admins can set a weekly schedule so that school settings are in place when students are using Chromebooks in class but, these same settings can be scheduled to turn off after school hours so they don’t apply when a parent might be using the device.</p><p><br/><b>Spark school spirit</b><br/>You can use the Education license to display digital signage, keeping students and parents informed. It’s simple to set up school-wide displays on computers in the library and monitors around the school to advertise of key school events and moments, like parent/teacher evenings, carnivals and assessment times.</p><br/><p>We’re excited to see the growing number of countries like New Zealand partnering with Google to support teachers, schools and families to improve the use of technology in education.</p><p><br/></p></div></div></body></html>
title: All Kiwi schools get the license to Chrome

description: <p>互联网银行经过几年的发展，已经有估值超千亿规模的小巨头。<br/></p><p>近日，据界面<a href="http://finance.ifeng.com/a/20181022/16538073_0.shtml" target="_blank">报道</a>，一份北京市某机构的项目推介材料显示，腾讯旗下的前海微众银行目前市场估值为1200亿人民币起，且公司预计在未来几年实现A股上市，届时预计估值5000亿元人民币左右。</p><p>相比而言，在2016年6月，微众曾定增融资12亿元，投后估值为50亿美元（320亿元）。今年3月23日科技部发布的《2017年中国独角兽企业发展报告》中，以92.3亿美元（约为640.82亿元）的估值位列第11位。如果按后者计算，7个月的时间里，它的估值涨了1.8倍。</p><p>公开资料显示，微众银行是首批获批和首家开业的民营银行和互联网银行，同期还有浙江网商银行、天津金城银行、温州民商银行和上海华瑞银行。2014年12月，微众银行获得深圳银监局颁发的金融许可证，注册资本30亿元。在上述所提及的增资后，腾讯依旧是占股30%的第一大股东。业务上，微众曾于2015年5月中旬推出普惠金融贷款产品“微粒贷”，并先后登陆到QQ和微信的金融服务中。</p><p>从微众不足五年的发展史来看，能在这么短的时间有千亿估值及上市蓝图，可能主要在于其向好的收入和盈利的加持。</p><p>微众的收入和盈利都在翻倍增长。上述所提推介材料显示，2018年上半年微众收入41.9亿元，净利润11亿元，接近2017年全年水平。而从过去三年的数据来看，微众的收入分别为2.26亿元、24.49亿元和67.48亿元；同期的净利润分别为-5.84亿元、4.01亿元和14.48亿元。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22110017/wjsujktqnoq4gfma.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,331"/></p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">来自微众2017年年报</span></p><p label="正文" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">再看网商银行，2015年下半年、2016年和2017年，它的收入分别为2.53亿元、26.37亿元和42.75亿元；而同期的盈利分别为-0.92亿元、3.16亿元和4.04亿元。</span></p><p label="正文" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">微众的收入和盈利都在赶超网商，这或许也是前者可以实现溢价的点之一。<br/></span></p><p label="正文" style="">虽然微众的单笔贷款金额低于网商，但是在腾讯两大流量平台超10亿用户的导流下，累计贷款金额和服务人群更具规模效应。</p><p label="正文" style="">微众2017年报数据显示，累计向近1200万人在线发放贷款8700亿元。其中，“微粒贷”笔均放款额稳定在8200元左右，近74%的单笔借款为银行带来的收入在100元以内。而网商<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">自开业以来累计服务小微企业和小微经营客户571万户，累计放款额4468亿元，户均贷款余额2.8万元。其中，“余利宝”累计为675万小微经营者提供了现金管理服务。</span></p><p label="正文" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">追溯这两家互联网银行的发展，差异化的定位和发展路径促成了如今的结果。</span></p><p label="正文" style=""><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">苏宁金融研究院高级研究员赵卿</span><a href="http://finance.sina.com.cn/stock/usstock/c/2018-07-18/doc-ihfnsvyz7031638.shtml" target="_blank" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">分析</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">认为</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，微众的优势在于QQ以及微信积累的超10亿用户，具有有效的数据信息，所以其主业以消费金融为主，主打微粒贷产品，净息差在7%左右，远高于民营银行平均4%的净息差水平，更是高于商业银行整体净息差水平。网商的优势是淘宝商户和支付宝用户，以及线下扫码商户等，所以网商的客户群体目前主要是小微经营者和小微商户，个人贷款业务在蚂蚁金服，和微众的差别较大，净息差也没有微众银行高，所以二者盈利上会有差距。</span></p><p label="正文" style=""><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">虽然微众的成长速度很快，成为民营银行中的超级独角兽，但其发展中有很多潜在的问题待解决。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此前，上海新世纪资信评估投资服务有限公司将微众的主体信用等级由AA+上调至AAA，让其成为国内首家获AAA评级的民营银行。但是从微众的资产质量等指标来看，依旧存在隐忧。就不良贷款率来看，已经从15年的0.12%上升至17年的0.64%。这意味着，与贷款金额和用户一起增长的，还有潜在的风险。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">也有人担忧，微众过于依赖“微粒贷”。据2017年年报数据，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">微众的无担保消费贷款业务微粒贷管理的贷款余额逾1000亿元，存在收入结构单一的问题。对于这一担忧，微众</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">相关人士曾<a href="http://finance.sina.com.cn/roll/2018-07-07/doc-ihexfcvk9027309.shtml" target="_blank">表示</a>，“作为初创公司，稳扎稳打，在深入做好‘微粒贷’的基础上再发掘其他业务机会。目前，直通银行和消费金融已步入良性发展阶段，去年也取得了较快增长。”</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">在过去几年，曾有14家民营银行分两批试运营。作为首家开业的民营银行，微众有可能是“中国民营银行第一股”。随着业务模式的日渐成熟，可以预见将有更多的民营银行落地资本市场。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p>
title: 腾讯投的“微众”估值涨至1200亿元，它会是“民营银行第一股”吗？

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>The ability to connect with people and services—whether that’s sending a message or streaming a video—has become part of our daily lives. Yet, far too often, we encounter situations where the connection is just too slow to use—or we have no connectivity at all.</p><br/><p>In the U.S., while mobile Internet access is widely available, download speeds are among the slowest in the developed world. Why? You can think of wireless networks like a highway, and they’re getting congested as demand continues to grow, leading to slowdowns. So if we increase available wireless spectrum, it’s like adding lanes on a highway to carry additional traffic.</p><br/><p>Together with a multitude of industries including mobile, cable, IoT and more, we’ve worked closely with the U.S. government to foster policies for a new shared spectrum approach to wireless connectivity. The <a href="https://www.cbrsalliance.org/resource/what-is-cbrs/">Citizens Broadband Radio Service (CBRS)</a> is a successful example of this approach. CBRS allows a wide array of business models to use shared spectrum—from mobile carriers to rural broadband providers to venue owners—without having to spend significant resources to acquire usage rights. A cloud-based Spectrum Access System (SAS) intelligently manages sharing between new and incumbent users. By sharing underutilized portions of spectrum, CBRS adds capacity, lowers barriers to commercial entry and paves a path to 5G.</p><br/><p>Unlike today’s wireless networks, CBRS will consist of densely packed radios from multiple providers all sharing the same spectrum, and sometimes even the same network. This completely changes the way you plan, deploy and operate your network. We are bringing the best of Google, such as our geo-spatial insight, network infrastructure and computational capabilities to deliver <a href="http://www.google.com/get/spectrumdatabase">a suite of products</a> to enable CBRS networks, starting with Google’s SAS.</p><br/><p>It is genuinely exciting to see the wireless ecosystem embrace CBRS and ultimately enhance wireless Internet for everyone. We’ve been at this for a long time, going back to a <a href="https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/sites/default/files/microsites/ostp/pcast_spectrum_report_final_july_20_2012.pdf">Presidential study</a> that proposed the framework behind CBRS. Now, CBRS is rapidly approaching commercial availability with first deployments expected this year.</p><br/>If you want to get started with CBRS, we’d love to <a href="http://www.google.com/get/spectrumdatabase">hear from you</a>.<p></p></div></div></body></html>
title: A new approach to enabling abundant wireless connectivity
只求增长、不行管制的 Reddit，前产品高管说它已「无可救药」| Global 24/7

description: <address><p>10.24是属于程序员们的节日，在这个重要的时间节点，36氪邀请了5位经历丰满的技术创业者，回答了一些关于创业的问题，原汁原味地呈现出来，希望给有创业想法的职场人尤其是程序员们提供一些有价值的观点和内容，欢迎在文末评论区留言交流。</p><p>本篇为1024技术创业者特别问卷之四，由<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5135234.html" target="_blank">编程猫</a>创始人李天驰回答。</p></address><p><br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/21144819/qudc2epmdcmmtrlx.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1280,853"/></p><p class="img-desc">李天驰</p><p><strong>Q：为什么创业？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>希望能改变一些东西，比如让所有孩子都学会编程。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：</strong><strong>你是如何确定现在的行业和项目的？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>我一直相信这三点：大势比细节重要，趋势比当下重要，大环境比小环境重要。</p><p>人工智能会改变我们的社会是毋容置疑的，所以人才的培养目标一定会发生变化。编程是这个变化里的核心因素。</p><p>社会的大变化—&gt;人才培养目标的变化—&gt;教育发生变化—&gt;新学科诞生</p><p>这是我确定少儿编程教育一定会飞跃式发展的逻辑，事实上，过去30年间，另一个社会的大变化——经济全球化带来的新学科也是这样一个逻辑在落地——英语。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：你是如何组建你的创业团队的？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>首先是要确定“人才是企业第一生产力”这个定理吧。</p><p>创业公司其实就是新市场和原有人才的重新整合。比如说在线教育，实际上就是把原来保险行业，消费品行业的销售人才和线上教育这个新的产品组合起来了，所以组建团队的前提其实是深入洞察到行业的本质。</p><p>当然工作者群体的变化也会对企业有很大的影响。编程猫的内部经常提一个文化价值观：No fun go die，很多人问我为什么？大家都不能理解，因为大家眼里的培训公司不是这样的，甚至有人总结出以前一些做得很好的上市企业招的老师是这样的：吃苦耐劳，通常家在农村，通常有弟弟妹妹要照顾。这其实是因为在上一个时代，培训行业的主要目标是帮助学生“提分”，所以才出现的情况，而且上个时代的工作者“80后”其实普遍有这样的特点，他们也确实很会“提分”。现在我们做少儿编程教育，面向的是05后和10后，我们重视的就不是“提分”，而是“核心素养”和“综合能力”，这样那些只会“提分”的老师在我们这里就会很吃力，所以我们要找的老师就不是“吃苦耐劳的80后”。我们需要找到的是“有趣，肯拼”的95后，这是我们为什么强调“No fun go die”的价值观，要把编程教给小朋友，必须从兴趣开始，编程猫的教育工作者必须具备很好的趣味。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：</strong><strong>技术人创业，是否有特别的优势？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>我一开始是觉得有一定优势的，但是今天看回来，是有巨大的优势。</p><p>因为本质上我们是在做一个如何用技术改变传统行业的事情，如果不能深刻理解技术，就很难找得到合适的切入口，流于表面做一些看起来“高大上”的东西。比如说我们做的一个人机交互系统，用来更好地帮老师教孩子学会编程，我一直跟大家强调，其实简单的暴力算法就已经能解决我们当前的问题了，有很多不懂技术的产品会特别想把一些机器学习啊，深度学习啊搞进去。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：技术人创业，是否有明显的劣势？是如何克服的？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>有的，比如说对品牌建设，市场投入，对管理等等方面，肯定会有劣势。但是只要有快速学习的心态其实这些是可以很快成长的。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：</strong><strong>你一天的工作节奏是怎样的？压力大吗？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>节奏还是蛮快的。压力是有的，不过这也正常，公司现在正处于快速发展的阶段，每天都会遇到很多新的问题，这催促着一个创始人不断的适应新的节奏。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：</strong><strong>工作之外有哪些兴趣爱好？能分配多少时间？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>会经常打篮球，偶尔会找一些比较有意思的老游戏出来玩，也会玩一些新游戏，像塞尔达这些。篮球的话每天几乎都会打。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：创业过程中，你遇到的最灰暗的时刻和事件？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>创业每一天都在处理不同的问题，灰暗和高光是分布在每一天的。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：创业过程中，你遇到的最高光的时刻和事件？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>15年8月底左右吧，有个孩子的父母跟我们说孩子每天睡觉的时候都把编程猫的卡片放在枕头底下。这是我创业以来最开心的时刻了，因为我知道这个意味着编程猫是有生命力的，是能影响孩子的，很多人不理解，对我来说，编程猫是个有生命的IP，这一点极其重要。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：</strong><strong>创业带给了你什么？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>带来了全方位的高速成长吧。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：你对创业成功的定义是什么？距离这个目标还有多远？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>创业成功的定义，应该是影响了很多人吧。编程猫是做教育的公司，当然是能给更多的孩子带去优质有趣的编程教育。我们每天都在日拱一卒地离目标更近，多远我不知道，但愿功不唐捐。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：你的偶像是谁？</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>乔布斯和不二雄吧。乔布斯很多人都知道，藤子 F 不二雄先生是哆啦A梦的作者。特别希望能在孩子们心中创造出一个陪伴他们成长，和他们一起经历成长的编程猫。</p><p>---</p><p><strong>Q：给未来有创业计划的程序员一点建议吧~</strong></p><p><strong>A：</strong>先找个女朋友吧。</p><p><br/></p><p>-END-</p><address><p>相关推荐<br/></p></address><p><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5157138.html">1024 专访 | 李佳芮：写代码让我快速进入解决问题的“心流”</a></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5157386.html">1024 专访 | 范怀宇：保持开放，创业带给我被快放了的人生</a></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5157571.html" target="_blank">1024 专访 | 王洪龙：被抄袭，也不会被超越，仍然会领跑</a></p>
title: 1024 专访 | 李天驰：技术人创业有巨大的优势

description: <p><strong>近日，36氪发现了一个名为“新草”的 App，可能是头条孵化用以对标小红书的内容社区产品。</strong></p><p>App Store 的相关信息显示，新草的简介是“年轻人都爱逛的种草社区”，3 周前上线，开发者为北京快码加编科技有限公司，该公司此前还开发过两款相机产品。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22074050/bd4prcgensrc2ewa.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,375"/></p><p class="img-desc">App Store 里关于“新草”的相关信息</p><p>根据<a href="https://www.qixin.com/company/b4aa663d-5e6c-43b5-b130-1b2fa27abc43" target="_blank">启信宝</a>的信息，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">北京快码加编科技有限公司的最大股东兼法人是梁汝波，他同时也是今日头条的技术总监、天津字节跳动的法人，也是</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">北京微播视界科技有限公司（</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">抖音的开发者</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">）</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">法人。也就是说，新草背后站着的，可能就是今日头条母公司——字节跳动。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">前不久，<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/MlDWCX73iI0ZzD1BJlwhWw" target="_blank">也有报道称今日头条正在做一款生活社区产品“新草 App”</a>，是在孵化阶段的产品，目前还在测试，未来会与抖音合作做推广。产品目前定位是帮助年轻人更好的生活，未来产品定位和功能也会根据用户需求的变化而调整。</span></p><address><p><strong>用头条逻辑做的内容社区？</strong></p></address><p>提及社区和种草，很难让人不联想到小红书。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">打开新草首页，同样采用了推荐和关注的分区，内容也是从“年轻人的生活”出发做延伸。</span></p><p><strong>但出身于头条的“新草”，也还是一个用头条逻辑做的内容社区：</strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22125439/6gsqrygtre95k6n8.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,455"/></p><p class="img-desc">左一为新草；中间为头条；右一为小红书。新草首页并无“发布”功能，隐藏在话题页中</p><ul style="list-style-type: disc;" class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>新草顶栏包含家居、美食、旅行、数码等 TAB，与头条顶栏的 TAB 逻辑类似，但小红书更多依靠内容中的标签来引导用户。</p></li><li><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">信息流为“图片+文字”或“视频+文字”的横版，与小红书两栏分布的瀑布流相比，</span><strong style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">一个界面能呈递的信息很少、效率过低；</strong></p></li><li><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">打开单个内容，想要继续阅读只能退回信息流；而小红书直接在内容下方继续推送类似帖子。</span></p></li><li><p><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">更重要的是，作为一个内容社区，新草将用户上传内容的入口藏得极深，首页并无露出。只有当用户点击某个话题，即图中绿色的 TAG，才能在话题之中上传图文或视频。</span></strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">作为资讯分发者的头条当然可以这么玩，毕竟用户们更多希望看到大号撰写的新闻；但作为社区，过多跳转、话题限制都会影响用户分享的积极性，直接拉低 UGC 内容数量，倒像是个生活方式版的今日头条了。</span></p></li></ul><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif"></span><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif; text-align: center;">这样做，或许是想在前期依靠 PGC 内容和话题的设置构建出更好的社区氛围，但社区毕竟还是要靠用户自发产出的内容来拉动活跃度，新草若想追赶一亿小红薯的小红书，还要在产品设计上做更多调整。</span></strong></p><p>至于如何在早期丰富内容，36氪了解到，新草此前就已经邀请了一些大小红人入驻平台。其中有部分 KOL 告诉36氪，新草在 8 月就开始联系入驻事宜，<strong>是以今日头条旗下产品发起的邀请</strong>。新草表示会给到一定的流量倾斜，在推荐页首页更多露出，让内容更多曝光，但当前的大多内容来自于其他社交平台的技术抓取。但也有 KOL 告诉36氪，虽然其入驻了今日头条，但并未收到新草的邀请，目前新草上的内容有可能是它从头条上抓取的。</p><p>此外，当前有部分内容关联了商品，用户可以点击“种草”，并在商品界面看到淘宝或天猫的参考价格，<strong>但还不能在 App 内完成购买，也不能跳转到购物平台，电商的闭环尚未形成。</strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22130157/93usmfh3jsdd4stk.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="2438,1461"/></p><p class="img-desc">图片中显示的“天猫”还并不能完成跳转</p><address><p><strong>颠覆了内容分发之后，头条能够颠覆电商吗？</strong><br/></p></address><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从头条自身布局来看，新草和此前刚<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5157453.html" target="_blank">上线不久的值点</a>或许代表了其寻求电商变现的不同战略倾向。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">作为主打低价购物的 APP，值点面向的显然是更广泛的下沉市场，入行门槛相对低，<strong>但其新闻信息流与商城内容并不相关。</strong>资讯能够吸引下沉用户，却很难构建出与这部分人群消费心理契合的购物场景，最终呈现出来的产品也就充满“割裂感”，像是个加了电商板块的今日头条。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">新草的目标人群和定位明显更加年轻化，无论是“好东西、好地方、好青年”的 slogan，还是社区内现在分享的各类新潮玩物，都与值点明显不同，倒是与抖音比较匹配。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22113111/hfaixf06kvkhn5kr.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="2438,1565"/></p><p class="img-desc">值点 App 截图，详细解读可见<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5157453.html" target="_blank">36氪此前的焦点分析</a>，值得看版块与今日头条很相似</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">作者初步的感觉是，值点和头条、新草和抖音，分别勾画出了中国的两类人群，前者要性价比、后者要体验和内容。因而呈现在产品上，前者直接罗列了商品和低价，后者还在经验分享和参考价格上停留，努力营造小而美的氛围，并未直接走到电商。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">但无论在哪条路上，头条面临的对手都太多了。</span></p><p>单是像新草这样想做内容社区电商的，我们就能罗列不少：小红书、网易考拉的“种草社区”、虎扑的“毒”......还有诸如<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5088444.html" target="_blank">火球买手</a>、<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5156625.html" target="_blank">棒棒糖</a>、<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5048793.html" target="_blank">毒物</a>、nice 这样的初创项目。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">更何况，虽然从内容社区转到内容电商有天然优势，但这背后的供应链和消费逻辑转变都会给平台带来巨大挑战，<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5147288.html">小红书自己的电商路就走得不太顺畅</a>。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">新草的电商可能性在于“种草”，但目前看来，<strong>更可能会走一个像抖音购物车功能那样，向大型电商平台导流的广告变现路径。</strong>而现在的</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">新草还只是个小而美的内容社区，离内容电商还有很长一段距离，背靠抖音的大树，新草能否挑战小红书？36氪也将持续关注，欢迎各位讨论。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">—————————————————</span></p><p>我是36氪詹妮妮，关注消费领域新鲜事，交流可加微信muar22，劳请备注姓名、公司、职位。</p><p>（36氪作者思齐、刘士武、可欣、徐子、梦悦对本文亦有贡献<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">）</span></p><address><p><strong>PS，在更早之前的民间传闻，这款用以对标小红书的产品被称为“海草”。</strong></p></address><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22102811/udi0f7b77vt19dm6.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,409"/></p><p class="img-desc">截图来自微博</p>
title: 头条系「新草」上线，能再造一个「小红书」吗？

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Ten years ago, we introduced the first version of the Android operating system with the T-Mobile G1, and launched Android Market (now Google Play) the very same day. Android has grown up a lot since then—there are now more than 2 billion active Android devices around the world.</p><p>The operating system itself has gone through some major transformations, too. The G1 ran on Android 1.0—a version so early, we didn’t even name it after a dessert. The debut included features that you know and love today like pull-down notifications, sharing content across apps and multitasking between apps. But it didn’t have more advanced features like voice search, turn-by-turn navigation or NFC. 10 years later, we’ve come a long way! Our latest release of the operating system, <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/android/introducing-android-9-pie/">Android 9 Pie</a>, has all of those features and harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to make your phone smarter, simpler and more adaptive.<br/></p><p>On the occasion of Android’s 10th birthday, we’re taking a trip down memory lane to look at the earliest versions of Android, the major improvements of each release and how far we’ve come:<br/></p></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><h3>Cupcake (Android 1.5) added virtual keyboards, customization options and easy ways to share.</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Cupcake.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Cupcake.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>With the introduction of virtual keyboards, Cupcake opened the doors to full touchscreen Android devices. And with home screen app widgets, you had more ways to customize your device, a defining feature still used today, alongside app folders. Sharing directly from your smartphone became easier with more ways to copy and paste and the ability to capture, share and upload videos.</p><p></p><h3>Donut (Android 1.6) gave you one easy place to search across your phone and the web.</h3>Donut introduced Android’s Quick Search Box, which lets you get search results from both the web and across your phone, from a single box on the homescreen. Even in these early days, the system was designed to learn which search results were more relevant, getting you to the right results faster the next time you typed in a relevant query. We also introduced support for different screen densities and sizes, laying the foundation for the very high density screens and variety of phone sizes we see today. <br/><p></p><h3>Eclair (Android 2.0+) changed driving forever with Google Maps navigation and speech-to-text.</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Eclair.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Eclair.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Google Maps navigation made Android smartphones, well, smart. Turn-by-turn directions using Google Maps data included many features found in a typical in-car navigation system: a forward-looking 3D view, voice guidance and traffic information—all for free on your high resolution phone. Eclair also added speech-to-text transcription, which lets you input text like emails and messages with your voice.</p><p>We also introduced a fan favorite feature: live wallpapers.<br/></p><h3>Voice Actions in Froyo (Android 2.2+) helped you do even more hands-free.</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Froyo.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Froyo.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Froyo took Android voice capabilities to the next level with Voice Actions, which let you perform key functions on your phone—searching, getting directions, making notes, setting alarms and more—with just the sound of your voice. <a href="https://assistant.google.com/#?modal_active=none">Sounds familiar</a>…</p><h3>Gingerbread (Android 2.3) added early battery management capabilities.</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Gingerbread.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Gingerbread.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Gingerbread helped you get the most out of your battery life by knowing exactly how your device was using it, from screen brightness to any active app. With Android 9, we’ve taken battery life management to a whole new level with Adaptive Battery, which uses AI to learn the apps you use most and prioritize battery for them.</p><h3>Honeycomb (Android 3.0) extended Android to more shapes and sizes.</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Honeycomb.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Honeycomb.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Honeycomb’s new Holo design language, along with larger layout and rich animation support, made the most of your tablet’s screen. This was the first version of Android that was intended for different form factors, laying the groundwork for more robust and flexible platforms introduced later, like Android TV, Android Auto, Android Things and Wear OS by Google.</p><p></p><h3>Ice Cream Sandwich (Android 4.0) introduced smooth moves</h3>Ice Cream Sandwich introduced a simplified and streamlined design to help you get things done on your phone faster. New features like app folders, a favorites tray and widgets made it easier to find and use your favorite apps. The addition of NFC didn’t just pave the way for mobile payments—it also made <a href="https://googleblog.blogspot.com/2011/10/unwrapping-ice-cream-sandwich-on-galaxy.html">“beaming”</a> of maps, videos, links and contacts easy by placing two phones together. <br/><p></p><p>Navigation became more intuitive with the arrival of quick settings and the ability to swipe to dismiss recent apps and notifications, features first introduced in tablets with Honeycomb, brought to phones. This release reflected a renewed focus on creating fluid experiences in Android—an effort that continues to this day with intuitive gestures in Android 9. <br/></p><h3>Jelly Bean (Android 4.1) brought personalized and intelligent assistance to the palm of your hand</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Jelly Bean.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Jelly_Bean.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>A precursor to the Google Assistant, Google Now in Jelly Bean helped you get the information you needed at just the right time—like the daily weather as you got dressed and commute times before you walked out the door. Notifications became richer, allowing you to expand them to show more content and immediately take actions, such as liking a post, archiving an email or even blocking future notifications.</p><p></p><h3>Ok Google, tell me about KitKat (Android 4.4)</h3>KitKat built on the earlier Voice actions, uniting the helpfulness of Google Now with improvements in voice technology and letting you launch voice search, send a text, get directions, or play a song just by saying “Ok Google.” KitKat also brought lighter colors and transparency to Android’s design, setting the stage for Material Design in Lollipop.<br/><p></p><h3>Android 5.0’s Lollipop brought great design to Android</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Lollipop.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Lollipop.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>With Lollipop, we brought Material Design to Android, introducing an entirely new look and feel that made it easier to navigate your device. <a href="https://material.io/">Material Design</a> is a visual language that combines the classic principles of good design with the innovation of technology and science. Lollipop also made it more seamless to transition across the devices that you use throughout the day, so that you can pick up where you left off across Android phones, tablets, TV and wearables.</p><p></p><h3>Help was on tap in Android 6.0 Marshmallow</h3>Marshmallow represented another next step in the journey to the Google Assistant we know today. With Now on Tap, you could simply tap and hold the Home button to get contextual help—customized to your task at hand, without having to leave what you were doing, whether in an app or on a website. <br/><p></p><p>To help save your juice for the things that matter most, Marshmallow brought some new battery saving features: Doze, which automatically puts your device into a sleep state when it’s at rest, and App Standby, which limits the impact of less frequently used apps on battery life.<br/></p><p>We also introduced run-time permissions, which help users better understand and evaluate requests for apps to have access to certain data. <br/></p><h3>N was for Nougat (Android 7.0) and new emoji</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Nougat.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Nougat.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Nougat focused on improvements to the ways you were already using your phone—adding multi-window to let you run two apps side by side, instant reply within notifications, adjustable display size for improved accessibility, and Data Saver which limits how much data your devices uses on background. We also introduced VR mode to enable high-quality VR experiences for apps, and 63 new emoji that focus on <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/android/promoting-gender-equality-through-emoji/">better gender representation</a>—in all six skin tone options. 🙌</p><h3>The world’s favorite cookie became the world’s favorite new Android release—Android 8.0 Oreo</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--medium h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--4 h-c-grid__col--offset-4 "><img alt="Oreo.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Oreo.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Oreo introduced ways to navigate tasks on your phone more seamlessly, like picture-in-picture, and Autofill, which helps you log into your apps faster. Oreo also continued to simplify the Android experience with more visual cohesion and easier gestures—like swiping up from the homescreen to see all your apps.</p><p>And with Oreo (<a href="https://www.android.com/versions/go-edition/">Go edition</a>), we built our first-ever configuration of Android specifically optimized for entry-level devices, ensuring that first-time smartphone users get a fast, powerful experience. <br/></p><h3>Android 9 Pie serves a slice of Digital Wellbeing</h3></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Pie.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pie.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>The way we use our phones—and how much time we spend on them—has changed a lot since the days of Cupcake. So one of the biggest changes in Android 9 Pie is the introduction of new ways for you to take control of your <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/android/search-jomo-new-research-digital-wellbeing/">digital wellbeing</a>, including a new app timer and a dashboard that lets you see how much time you spend in various apps. With Android 9, your phone also changes the way it works by learning from you—and working better for you—the more you use it. Artificial intelligence now powers core capabilities of your phone, from predicting your next task so you can jump right into the action you want to take to prioritizing battery power for the apps you use most and the ones it thinks you are going to use soon.</p><p>From the early days of Voice Actions with speech-to-text to an increasingly helpful smartphone with AI at its core, Android has continued to evolve over the past 10 years. And thanks to our open-source platform and the passionate community of users, partners and developers, Android has empowered innovations and given people access to the power of mobile technology. <br/></p></div></div></body></html>
title: Celebrating a Sweet Decade of Android

description: <blockquote><p>36氪专门为读书设立了【36氪领读】栏目，筛选一些值得读的书，并提供一些书摘。希望你手边有一本称心的书，让读书这场运动继续下去。</p><p>如何提高创业的成功率？本书通过1000个中国本土的创业案例，结合国际创业学理论，即学即用，是一本针对中国大陆地区创业者的、能被快速掌握的实用指南。</p></blockquote><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在数十年的商业模式分析、研究和应用中，我们认为，由亚历山大·奥斯特瓦德与伊夫·皮尼厄合作提出的商业模式画布Business Model Canvas）是目前对商业模式最有效、最简明易懂的表达方式。</span><br/></p><p>商业模式画布是什么呢？它是构建商业模式的工具，一件做任何生意都用得上的“利器”。对于今天的每一个创业者来说，商业模式画布都是必须掌握的，对商业模式画布的理解和运用也是构建和提升创业情商的核心。画布模型让我们可以更清晰直观地了解商业逻辑，又可以使整个商业模式制定过程更加简单清晰。</p><p>下面几点可以帮助我们更好地理解商业模式画布。</p><p>（1）商业模式画布由九个格子组成，每一个格子代表了一个做生意的关键要素，所有的格子之间都是密不可分、相互影响的（如下图）。注意，每个格子并不是只和它旁边的格子有联系，而是和其他所有的格子都有关系。这些丰富的关联才是商业模式的真谛。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22080400/cudbyw5udajxcupt.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,391"/></p><p>（2）每一个格子所在的位置都有它特定的含义，一个格子的左右、上下都是不同的格子，它们之间有非常紧密的联系。</p><p>（3）我们要把这“九宫格”作为一个整体来看，它代表着一整盘的生意（而非企业的某一个业务领域）！</p><p>我们来看看这九个格子分别的含义。</p><p>价值主张：你准备为客户带来什么好处。</p><p>客户细分：到底你的东西要卖给谁，他是怎样的。</p><p>渠道通路：你如何找到目标客户，又如何交付产品或服务给他们。</p><p>客户关系：你准备和客户建立什么样的关系，比如，是一次性的买卖，抑或是永远的朋友。</p><p>关键业务：你要做些什么事情（生产、销售、交付等）才可以顺利完成跟客户的交易，达到你要求的效果。</p><p>核心资源：你需要哪些关键资源去做成这个生意，这些资源包含人、物、钱、设备等。</p><p>重要合作：哪些搭档可让你的生意成功。</p><p>收入来源：除了向客户要钱，你有哪些渠道或方法来赚钱。成本结构：你是否知道这笔账是怎样算的，成本之间的关系是怎样的。</p><h2 label="一级标题" style="">创业者需要培养对商业模式的“触觉”</h2><p>寻找商业模式与寻找创业机会不太一样。要构建一个成功的商业模式，创业者首先要培养自己对商业模式的“触觉”，因为商业模式需要花费一定的时间去学习和研究。商业模式触觉是一种认知及洞察力。如果有两个人步入一家生意兴隆的百货商店，一个人购买了手袋便离开，另一个人却兴致勃勃地去研究店铺在商业模式上的成功之处，我们会说后者是个对商业模式有触觉的人。</p><p>对商业模式的触觉不是与生俱来的，创业者可以通过不同方式来获得商业模式触觉。要培养这种触觉，创业者需要不断学习、观察、行动，或进行经验交流与探讨。比如，在新年期间，很多学生会在校园内的跳蚤市场贩卖贺年物品，就是通过行动（实地销售）获取商业模式触觉的一种方式。</p><p>研究商业模式的习惯是创业情商的重要组成部分之一。想要成功的创业者应当培养研究其他企业商业模式的习惯，经常用商业模式画布研习会是一个不错的办法。拥有较高创业情商的人，一般会渴望构建成功的商业模式，这种渴望会促使他们对不同的商业模式进行不断的观察和思考，直至建立起自己的商业模式。</p><h2 label="一级标题" style="">创新就是在商业模式九大元素中提出新方法</h2><p>彼得·德鲁克指出：“创新是赋予资源创造财富的新能力，增加原有资源的价值就是创新。”如果我们只是停留在复制别人的商业模式层面，而没有自己的创新，是难以创造更大的价值的。</p><p>实际上，商业模式是大部分创新发生的地方，创业者可以在商业模式画布的“九宫格”的任何一格中进行创新，例如有新的价值主张、新的成本结构、新的合作伙伴、新的销售渠道、新的收入来源、新的业务流程，或是新的资源。懂得如何在商业模式上创新，创业者就有机会做得比别人更好，从而占领更大的市场份额。任何一个创业的过程，实质上是构建一个可行的商业模式的过程，也是对“九宫格”的部分或是整体进行创新的过程。所以，在这个层面上，创业其实就是创新，两者并无二致。</p><h2 label="一级标题" style="">创业的本质就是要在资金耗尽前验证商业模式</h2><p>对初创企业而言，最重要的事情是什么？请务必在你的资金耗尽之前找到一个行之有效的商业模式，否则你的企业将很难在残酷的竞争中赢得这一场“生存游戏”的胜利！</p><p>初创企业必须建立一个可行（viable）、可复制（scalable）的商业模式。创业者需要懂得一笔买卖与一整盘生意的分别：一笔买卖只是一次性的商业活动，只是暂时性的胜利；而一整盘生意却要具有一个可行的、可复制的商业模式，唯有如此才能获得长期的、可持续的发展。当初创企业成立后，其主要业务焦点应该放在寻找一个可行的、可复制的商业模式上。初创企业应当把销售及寻找第一个客户作为重中之重，在成功获得第一个客户之后可以建立营运团队，并将业务复制及扩张。</p><p>通常情况下，你的第一个商业模式不会是完全正确的。正如软件开发一样，构建商业模式也是一个需要不断验证及迭代的过程。你需要在创业阶段特别关注销售，因为只有当你赢得第一个客户并成功获取利润时，你才能证明你的商业模式确实可行。一旦发现目前的商业模式行不通，你也可以及时修改，在资金花光之前寻找到一个成功的商业模式。因此，创业的本质就是创业者要在资金耗尽前向所有利益相关者验证商业模式——这一点非常重要，请牢牢<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">记住！</span></p><p>商业模式本质上是由不同假设组成的一个商业逻辑系统，这个系统内包含不同的变量。商业模式是可以验证的——如果商业逻辑行得通，便可能会带来预期的结果。在寻找商业模式的过程中，创业者需要提出假设，以及和客户倾谈，了解他们的想法及实际需要，而验证商业模式是否正确的唯一标准是企业是否有净利润（net proﬁt）。如果企业不赚钱，便表示你的商业模式很可能已经出错。我们曾经问过不同创业者一个简单的问题：“你知道自己为什么要赚钱吗？”答案很简单。企业获取利润，除了要维持创业者及员工的生计之外，另一个重要因素就是证明你的商业模式真的可行，只有这样才能赢得股东及投资者的信任与支持。</p><h2 label="一级标题" style="">创业是一个不断修改商业模式的动态过程</h2><p>创业并不是去寻找一个完美的商业模式，而是去寻求一门可行的生意。因此，创业往往是一个不断修改商业模式的动态过程。要做好一盘生意，出色的执行力至关重要。如果没有执行力，即使拥有好的商业模式，企业也不会有好的业绩。相反，即使你原本的商业模式并不完善，但如果执行得好，你还可以通过不断修改商业模式来赢得最终成功。</p><p>商业模式并不是一成不变的。商业模式需要不停思考，更需要用实际行动去验证及改进。创业者需要一个可执行的商业模式，请和你的潜在客户交谈，特别是聆听你第一个客户的意见。他们会告诉你客户真正的需求，甚至“教”你如何修改商业模式。另一方面，你的社交圈子、网络也是构建商业模式的成功关键，千万不要害怕和别人讨论你的商业模式，当你分享越多，所获得的越多反馈将可以帮助你测试商业模式是否可行。</p><p>对“九宫格”的理解和应用需要长时间的“修行”。对创业者来说，当看见一个活生生的案例时，就要本能地在头脑中形成它的“九宫格”。这是一种潜移默化养成的习惯，这对我们创业情商的提升将大有裨益。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22074349/uqqtriggnwfft2tz.png!heading" data-img-size-val="442,587"/></p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc" style="">《创业情商：决定你创业成功的8种关键能力》</p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc">作者：<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">林诚光陈建行</span></p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">作者简介</h3><p>林诚光教授，澳大利亚国立大学管理学博士，现任香港大学经济及工商管理学院管理学教授及创业中心主任；曾担任多家上市公司独立非执行董事、香港大学经济及工商管理学院副院长等重要职务。</p><p>陈建行教授，现任复旦大学管理学院MBA客座教授、香港大学经济与管理学院IMBA客座副教授，是知名的实战派管理专家，具有丰富的商业及管理经验。曾担任全球音频技术领导企业美国DTS公司集团副总裁兼大中华区总监、全球知名系统优化企业Leccotech公司首席执行官。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">内容简介</h3><p>这是一本写给致力于在中国成功创业的创业者的实用指南。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">作为专注于创业领域的管理学教授，两位作者教授创业学课程并担任创业公司高级顾问已经超过20年。在这本书中，他们对超过1000个中国大陆创业的实际案例进行了深入剖析，发现创业者的成功很大程度上取决于创业机会、商业模式、创业销售、创业定价、管理团队等8种关键能力，涵盖商业敏锐度、创业销售能力和创业管理能力，即“创业情商”。</span></p><p></p>
title: 36氪领读 | 商业模式画布，创业者的制胜法宝

description: <p>文 | 36氪每日商业精选</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">数据“鬼城”的马蜂窝被捅，超级独角兽公司乱成一窝蜂</h3><p>10月21日，马蜂窝被指出存在严重的数据造假现象，今日，该公司发布声明称此为“有组织攻击行为”，并强调点评内容在其UGC内容数据中的占比仅为2.91%，但其后，马蜂窝又发文承认了部分造假。</p><p>马蜂窝于2006年创立，今年8月，获得3亿美元融资后其估值或达25亿美元。作为旅游网站后起之秀，主打用户生产内容的马蜂窝这几年的运营策略着重社交，相继推出问答、约伴等功能，新版 APP 更是强化了旅游短视频等社交信息流内容，希望......</p><blockquote><p><strong>主编点评：</strong>马蜂窝要向投资人解释流量与转化率之间的关系 ——......</p></blockquote><h3 label="二级标题" style="">宜家试运营网上商城，成功电商化需要考虑的不止卖和送</h3><p>10月16日，宜家在官网宣布正式试运营网上商城，目前向江浙沪地区5个省市共35个城市开放。物流配送由第三方服务商提供。</p><p>宜家全球总部2014年才决定从直营门店生意变成多渠道的零售商。2016年8月，宜家中国曾在上海地区上线过网上商城。而2018财年，宜家中国的销售额与线下商场访客量的增速均较往年放缓——线上业务成为宜家必然要发展的新增长点，而它几个月前也曾公开表示，预计电子商务服务将在今年年底覆盖中国149个城市。</p><p>同为主营线下门店、知名度较高的平价国外品牌，宜家在中国的电商化或许可以借鉴优衣库的经验。后者自......</p><blockquote><p><strong>主编点评：</strong>优衣库在华的电商化已算是比较成熟，但直到这个月还在天猫旗舰店和自营APP、微信小程序之间举棋不定。宜家在电商化时要解决的不仅是......</p></blockquote><address><p>本文来自36氪付费栏目《36氪每日商业精选》——10月22日</p><p>每天不到1元，深度资讯+主编点评，省时省心高效阅读</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/coupons/single?id=170?ktm_source=kk_feed102203_36krdaily" target="_blank" textvalue="【限时彩蛋】戳此订阅，立减10元&gt;&gt;">【限时彩蛋】戳此订阅，立减10元&gt;&gt;</a></p></address><h3><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5158313?ktm_source=kk_1022content3_36krdaily" target="_blank" textvalue="已购用户戳此查看完整内容&gt;&gt;">已购用户戳此查看完整内容&gt;&gt;</a></h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5158313?ktm_source=kk_1022content3_36krdaily" target="_blank"><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22102409/nxo8p4afcfl1aobu.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,2004"/></a></p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/coupons/single?id=170?ktm_source=kk_feed102203_36krdaily" target="_blank"><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201809/11103003/ehh1t5xr369unlza.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,3764"/></a></p>
title: 深度资讯 | 数据“鬼城”的马蜂窝被捅，超级独角兽公司乱成一窝蜂

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We all know you’re not supposed to touch the pieces of art in a museum, but what if you could jump inside them? In YouTube creator SoKrispy’s latest VR video, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ecajlIKwlCg">Do Not Touch</a>, the characters do just that: they literally dive into the artwork and become part of the scene.   </p></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-medium "><img alt="Do Not Touch GIF" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/Do_Not_Touch_-_GIF_Compressed.gif"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>A scene From SoKrispyMedia’s “Do Not Touch” VR Video</p></div></figcaption></figure><div class="rich-text"><p>Visual effects this advanced usually require physical equipment like green screens that can be costly and difficult to set up. SoKrispy, however, was able to achieve many of the effects in post-production with <a href="https://vr.google.com/jump/">Google’s Jump VR Video</a> suite, along with Adobe Creative Suite, Unreal Engine, and Autodesk 3DS Max.</p><p>To make it look like the actors were actually inside the pictures, SoKrispyMedia used Jump’s "<a href="https://www.blog.google/products/jump/announcing-high-quality-stitching-jump/">high-quality stitching</a>" option, a feature that lets creators achieve a green screen effect without needing a physical screen. They also utilized this feature in one of their earlier works, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ieIar09dRk">“Video Game Vehicle,”</a> after discovering in post-production that the physical green screen they had used while filming wasn’t big enough. High-quality stitching let them “fix it in post” with a few clicks, rather than spending days reshooting with a wraparound green screen.<br/></p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-medium "><img alt="DepthGreenscreen" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/Depth-Greenscreen-Final.gif"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Jump’s high-quality depth maps allow creators to get a green screen effect without a physical green screen</p></div></figcaption></figure><div class="rich-text"><p>So how does this feature work? In addition to producing higher quality stitches, it lets creators generate razor-sharp depth maps that estimate the distance (or depth) of every pixel in the scene. This enables the use of editing software like Adobe Premiere or After Effects to extract elements or even composite a new scene in the background, all without a physical screen or meticulous manual rotoscoping. And in the latest release of After Effects, our partners at Adobe have <a href="https://youtu.be/Oh9GJmND2jc">made it even easier to leverage Jump's depth maps</a> in post-production.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><figure class="article-image--full article-module "><img alt="SoKrispy ZDepth in Adobe GIF.gif" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/SoKrispy_ZDepth_in_Adobe_GIF.gif"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption h-c-page"><div class="rich-text"><p>Generating depth maps in Jump Manager gives you more flexibility in post-production</p></div></figcaption></figure></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>In addition to using depth maps, SoKrispyMedia used Jump’s high-quality stitches to realistically light computer generated (CG) objects with Image Based Lighting. Instead of having to capture separate light probes, creators can get the same effect with Jump’s high bit-depth 360° stitches. This saves valuable time on set and gives creators the ability to seamlessly integrate CG into live action footage with accurate lighting and reflections.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Car_IBL_Image.png" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Car_IBL_Image.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Side by side still of CG object’s from Video Game Vehicle with and without image based lighting</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>SoKrispyMedia also utilized a third, software-based post-production tool to enhance their Jump footage. Using a technique detailed on the <a href="https://ai.googleblog.com/2016/10/supercharging-style-transfer.html">Google AI blog</a> called “style transfer," they applied artificial intelligence to their footage to transform the look of each character into the style of the painting they’ve jumped into.  </p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Style Transfer.gif" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/Style_Transfer.gif"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Another scene From “Do Not Touch”</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Taken together, these software-based features—high-quality stitching, Image Based Lighting and style transfer—provide creators with new ways to share their vision with the world. As SoKrispyMedia’s Director and VFX supervisor Sam Wickert explains, “The most important aspect of these projects is to make VR content that is really worth watching in a headset, and these tools let us do that.” For audiences, this means we can look forward to traveling to all sorts of new destinations in the virtual world … from a video game environment to a museum where you actually jump into the paintings to wherever creators take us next.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: Seeing art in a new way: VR tools let characters jump right in

description: <p>Google Cloud AutoML问世以来一直热度不减，但关于机器学习自动化工具是否能真正落地却依旧饱受争议。</p><p>在企业看来，目前市面上的机器学习平台要么华而不实，无法实现工程项目；要么暴露大量专业的代码参数，并不能让企业真正用起来。</p><p>以AI工具去赋能行业并没有想象的那么简单。</p><p>既需要去理解用户的产品使用习惯，同时也需要深入到行业的各个环节中去，清晰指出AI到底能为公司解决什么样的问题，创造多大的价值。</p><p>对此，智易科技，这家来自深圳的AI初创企业走出了一条不同的路。</p><h3 label="二级标题"><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">AI极限挑战的背后&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">是对产品严苛的态度</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">机器学习平台的最大价值，是能够赋予企业自身AI能力，让企业能够结合自身的行业知识和经验研发出适合自己的AI模型。</span></p><p>而企业里最懂业务的，必然不是算法工程师，而是业务人员。而要让业务人员能将平台用起来，最关键就是做到——低门槛。</p><blockquote><p>“不能让企业真正有效用起来的产品，拥有再时髦的概念和技术也毫无意义。”智易科技CEO李杰在与一线企业深入交流后总结到。</p></blockquote><p>“许多公司都在抱怨购买的机器学习工具太复杂，根本用不起来。因为这类工具仅仅将使用门槛从100分降低到了80分，本质上仍是AI专家才能上手的黑科技。”</p><p>调研了市面上所有的机器学习平台，走访了身边所能接触的各类企业后，智易科技推出了「零门槛」的机器学习平台——深思。</p><p>为了测试产品“低门槛”的极限，这家公司曾邀请美团外卖小哥作为毫无AI背景的代表进行平台体验，并做到了让其15分钟内研发出一款简单的AI模型。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><blockquote><p>“当其他公司都在炫耀他们的算法、算力时，我们在努力将产品的低门槛做到极致。”李杰表示。</p></blockquote><p><strong>针对不懂AI技术的小白用户，智易将底层技术进行封装，把AI技术转化成简单易用的工具产品服务于行业，让用户无需拥有AI背景，只需专注于数据和商业需求，便能实现AI建模。</strong></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22101905/3mhvczpbf7dpsbbd.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="554,294"/></p><h3 label="二级标题"><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">将学术界的“AutoML”</span>&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">改造成商用“AutoML”</span></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">谷歌作为国际顶尖的AI巨头，在研究上投入了超乎想象的巨大算力资源，甚至动用TPU去运行它的 Cloud AutoML，但对于企业商用来说这并不现实。</span></p><p>相比于Google的AutoML，智易深思平台的AutoML采用了不同的技术路径去实现近似的效果，并且所消耗的算力资源大幅度降低。</p><p>举个简单的例子，相同环境下，Google Cloud AutoML研发出一个准确率98%的AI模型，智易深思平台仅以其1%的资源就能研发出一个准确率96%的AI模型。</p><blockquote><p>“对于大多数希望拥有人工智能技术的传统企业来说，追求的并不是从96%～98%，而是从无到有。”</p></blockquote><address><p>李杰毕业于清华大学，后取得UVa计算机博士学位，在微软和谷歌总部工作多年，拥有丰富的云计算及AI项目研发经验。</p></address><p>在与Deepmind合作的AI数据中心项目中，李杰深刻感受到了AI技术所能为企业在效率提升和价值创造上带来的重要意义，这也促使他萌发了搭建一个一站式AI平台赋能各行各业的想法。</p><p>传统的机器学习平台使用的是拖拉拽和代码相结合的交互方式，这对用户来说并不友好，用户在使用他们平台时常常会遇到以下问题：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>平台上的专业名词看不懂什么意思。</p></li><li><p>下一步应该点哪里？不知道怎么操作。</p></li><li><p>平台还要写代码？不懂！</p></li><li><p>说明文档在什么地方？找不到。</p></li></ul><blockquote><p>“真正好的产品应该是用户不需要阅读任何说明文档，按照自有的使用习惯就能很自然地进行下一步，直到完成整个AI模型的研发。”智易科技CPO谢伟钦表示“‘用户核心诉求’和‘用户体验’是尤为关键的两点，至于价格和功能，那都只是延伸。”</p></blockquote><p>考虑到灵活性，智易在深思平台支持面向开发人员的专业模式，由于其中内嵌了完整的技术配置，专业模式下AI专家可以自己选择合适的模型，以更高的效率和更少的资源消耗达成相同的目标。</p><h3 label="二级标题">深入行业 帮助企业在AI时代实现弯道超车</h3><p>秉承着用AI为各行各业创造价值的初心，智易科技从一开始就选择了To&nbsp;B的商业路径。</p><p>To B和To C存在着截然不同的逻辑，To B的技术公司，不仅要有产品，要有从售前到售后各个环节的综合服务体系，更重要的是还必须深入了解客户所在的行业。</p><p>“目前许多企业对人工智能仍存在着一定的认知差距，但当企业理解了人工智能、机器学习的逻辑，他们会提出更加有建设性的需求” 。</p><p>智易深思平台推出不足一年已服务了200+家企业客户，帮助企业实现业务AI赋能，其中30+家客户通过人工智能技术开启了企业增长的“第二曲线”，实现智能化转型升级。</p><blockquote><p>“客户永远是看效果的，而不是听你吹嘘技术和概念。”李杰表示。</p></blockquote><p>电信行业作为一个存量市场，运营商需要不断挖掘客户价值，因此许多客服在外呼中心天天打电话向用户推销套餐，但实际转化率并不理想。</p><p>国内三大运营商之一的某电信企业借助深思平台，使用脱敏的用户数据，经过AutoML多次迭代后得到最优AI模型，并利用该模型实现精准营销，将转化率提升了100%，在节省大量人力成本的同时提升了用户的满意度。</p><p>在传统的工业制造领域，制造商也能够通过深思平台零门槛地进行机器学习建模，自动分析生产过程中所采集到的全部变量，实时监测生产关键变量的变化情况，利用AI技术定位异常参数，生成诊断报告并进行故障恢复，实现生产线故障监控、定位、修复三位一体，从而大大提升工厂预测性维护的效率及良品率。</p><p>苹果某关键硬件供应商曾使用智易深思平台对元器件进行计算机视觉识别检测，利用元器件的测试数据进行AI建模，节省了通过原有手工测试方法所耗费的大量人力时间，显著提升了良品率。</p><p>据了解，智易科技近期与微软加速器达成了战略合作，与各地政府共同推进AI实训精创营项目，大力支持地方企业进行智能化转型升级，共同推动AI技术深入改变行业的生产方式，政府也将通过对接当地的产业和市场等方式给予了大力的支持。</p><p><strong>只要有充分的行业数据、明确的场景以及关键性的指标需求，深思平台都能够帮助企业以最低的成本用AI去提升效率，产生更大的价值。</strong></p><p><br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22102234/ivyr881yqxeegxgk.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="554,304"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">比如在零售领域借助AI实现销量预测和库存控制、金融领域用AI实现反欺诈、教育领域用数据决策结合AI实现因材施教、医疗领域通过AI辅助诊断等等。</span></p><p>在未来，基于数据的一切决策成本将趋于零，智易科技表示将继续致力于用平台为更多的场景和产业创造价值。</p>
title: 以零门槛AI工具赋能行业，智易科技帮助企业开启“第二曲线”

simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">核心提要如下：</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201810/22103342/u7bv1i9oazo3emic.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1024,683"/></p><h3 label="二级标题"><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600;">代购会消失吗？</span></h3><p>《电商法》实际落地的执行力度还未可知，不过<span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">可以明确的是，</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">代购的管理</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">成本和税务成本直接上升：</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">个人代购被纳入</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">电子商务经营者的范畴，需要</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">的身份信息和</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">纳税相关信息。</span></p><p>这意味着，未来代购要以正规主体运作，而且需要采购国和中国双方的营业执照。增加的税务成本让其在市场竞争中失去了价格优势，同时正规化运营加大了管理难度和成本。</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">这时候，代购们拥有两个选择：一是维持原来的业务不变，依法登记纳税；二是放弃</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">供应链环节，专心运营已有的流量体系。</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">中大型代购更倾向于前者，他们的规模较大，在此之前部分已经以企业的形式运作；而对于小型代购来说，放弃供应链是一个更为明智的选择。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">跨境采购对此时的小B代购来说并不经济，其最大的优势在于流量端，即经多年沉淀建立了强信任关系的消费客群。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">淘粉吧创始人刘俊认为，流量分散化、分工精细化是电商行业的发展趋势，</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">在人、货、场三个要素中，人和场越来越分散，而货却会更加集中。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">除了传统的电商平台，互联网环境下涌现出了各类大大小小的流量池，APP、网红、甚至是每个人都有自己的“一瓢水”，都有变现的价值；</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">消费场景也在分散化，消费者对于信任的购买渠道不会有特别的要求，选择越来越多样化。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif"></span></p><p>过去人、货、场都是在一个封闭的体系里，但未来电商一定会完全开放，而且分工更加精细。刘俊表示，“我甚至有一种极端的判断——或许未来阿里系和腾讯系会集中做‘货’，建立一个统一的招商和供应链体系，不仅仅服务于自有的场，而是开放给所有的流量平台。”</p><p><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &#39;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&#39;, &#39;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&#39;, sans-serif;">也就是说，《电商法》其实能促使整个行业进一步有效分工。跨境电商链条非常长，从开店、选品、供应链、系统、支付到仓储、物流、运营，每一个环节都有众多服务商。对于拥有出货能力的小B来说，这个市场对他们非常友好。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">代购们转向供应链公司采购货源，虽然利润空间缩小，但是交易量会上升，同时能节约时间成本和前期垫资成本。</span><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">根据公开信息，</span><span style="font-family: &#39;PingFang SC&#39;, &#39;Lantinghei SC&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, &#39;Microsoft YaHei&#39;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light,
